Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Handler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Handler
Direct Known Subclasses:
InfluenceHandler, MotherNatureHandler, MovementHandler
public class Handler extends Object
Class to handle part of business logic that depends on CharacterCard played

    • motherNatureMovement

      protected void motherNatureMovement(Player currentPlayer, MotherNature motherNature, int stepsChoice) throws MotherNatureStepsException, WinnerException
      Move mother nature by the specified steps
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the current player
      motherNature - the mother nature to be moved
      stepsChoice - the steps chosen by the player
      Throws:
      MotherNatureStepsException - thrown if the amount of steps is invalid
      WinnerException - thrown if there is a winner

    • getMostInfluentialPlayer

      protected Player getMostInfluentialPlayer(Player currentPlayer, Island island)
      Returns the most influential player on the specified island or group of islands
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the current player who has moved mother nature
      island - the Island where mother nature has ended her movement
      Returns:
      the most influential player on the specified island, the one who builds the tower
